system.description:
An enchantment to increase the Weapon Quality of a wholly metallic weapon. With success, WQ is increased by one (MS) or two (CS). Tempering of Pytama cannot be combined with any other WQ-increasing spell, and cannot be laid more than once on the same weapon.

The enchantment is a minor artifact power and “occupies” no Ego. See: Treasure 14.

The Duration is Permanent if the power is installed when the weapon is forged; otherwise, the Duration is Indefinite.

 

Bonus Effects

CML70+Enchantment may be laid upon a mostly metallic weapon.

 

Time: 15-CSI hours

Range: Touch

Duration: Indefinite/Permanent (see above)
